*Drazom steps out of the CR Chamber feeling much better* Mantella: Come out=
side with me. *Mantella says to Drazom* *Drazom follows her to the outside =
of the Predacon base* *They both sit on the ground* Mantella: Why are you p=
rotecting me? Drazom: well... Mantella: I mean, its kinda spooky. *Drazom s=
tarts playing with his fingers* Mantella: Your acting like you LOVE me or s=
omething. *A look of embarassment came on Drazom's face when Mantella said =
that* Mantella: Hmm. *Mantella said while smiling* Mantella: I think I know=
 the case. Your not so bad yourself. *Drazom looks Mantella in the eyes and=
 she looks back* *They keep looking for a minute but than Drazom starts mov=
e foward some* *When their lips are a few inches away from each others, Man=
tela climbs to her feet and runs into the Predacon base* Drazom:....  *Draz=
om looks a look of dissapointment but promises to himself that he won't giv=
e up*
